mapper.select: select vpn_code vpnCode, vpn_name vpnName, eff_date effDate, exp_date expDate, state state, vpn_type vpnType, vpn_number vpnNumber from tif_vpn_group where vpn_code = #{vpnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select vpn_mem_id vpnMemId, vpn_code vpnCode, mem_number memNumber, offer_id offerId, eff_date effDate, exp_date expDate, mem_seq memSeq, serv_id servId from tif_vpn_mem where VPN_MEM_ID = #{vpnMemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
